page.title: 06A23 TRUNK ROAD (cont'd)
page.content: There are 4 events on the A23 during the year and these are_ The R.A.C. Veteran Car Run, The Veteran Motor Cycle Run, The Historical Commercial Vehicle Run The Morris Minors Owners' Club. The permitted maximum tonnage of vehicles using the A23 is between 38 and 42 tonnes depending on the number of axles and how far they are apart. No cases of child disappearances were connected with the A23 during 1984/85. There is a Sub Police Station used as a base for the policing of the A23 situated at job's Corner (O.S.273203) All information on pages 5,6, is from the Sussex Police and only concerns the A23 between O.S. references 269119 and 266170. This stretch of the A23 is the subject of a public enquiry and the the proposed new route will lie to the immediate east of the present road
